column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
女性しかいない ゲルドの街って
どんなところだろうな？
そこに行けば きっとオレも モテモテだぜ
column4:
Only women are allowed in Gerudo Town.
What do you think they do all day
in there?
I betcha if I could get in somehow, I'd be
a big hit. The only man in a whole city
of ladies...

column3:
うわぁ魔物だよ！
なんとかしてくれぇ
column4:
Aaaaaah! Monsters! Somebody do
something!

column3:
くそっ ここまできて
やられてたまるか…
column4:
I refuse to let those monsters kill me
after coming all the way out here!

column3:
こんな広い砂漠の真ん中で 
魔物に遭遇するって どんだけ運が悪いんだよ
column4:
Nothing but sand for miles in every
direction, and I STILL manage to run
into monsters? I have the worst luck.

column3:
うぇええ…ぺっ！ ぺっ！
口の中が砂でいっぱいだよ
column4:
Ptoo! Ptui! Ugh... I got sand in my
mouth.

column3:
オレたちは砂漠に浮かぶオアシス
ゲルドの街を探しているんだぜ
そこは女性ばかりの街で
かわいらしい女が たくさんいるらしい
そんなところに男気あふれる俺たちが行けば
モテモテ間違いなしだぜ！
…あ
今 うらやましいと思ったな？
キミみたいな きゃしゃな男は たぶんモテないぜ
あきらめるんだな！
column4:
We're headed for Gerudo Town, a 
shimmering oasis in the desert.Someone told us it's a whole city of
foxy ladies. I bet they'll treat us two
fine studs like kings!
Say... You're not jealous of our plan,
are you? Well, too bad! No copying our
idea! We had it first!
Besides, what woman would be
interested in a skinny twig like you?

column3:
早く逃げろ！
ガーディアンが来るぞ！
column4: Run! Quickly! There's a Guardian coming!

column3:
よし相棒！気を取り直して
ゲルドの街に向かおうぜ！
さあ街まで案内してくれ！
column4:
You OK, buddy? C'mon, there's no use
crying over spilled milk. We're headed
to Gerudo Town!
I'll even let you lead the way!

column3: ウソだろ…
column4: You've gotta be kidding me...

column3: なんか迷ってない？
column4: Are we lost?

column3: 相棒が… まだ…
column4:
I want to run, but I can't! Not while
Jora still has a chance!

column3: 相棒を助けてやってくれ！
column4: You gotta save my friend!

column3:
相棒よ…
おまえの分も オレが幸せになってやる
column4:
No! Not Jora! This is horrible... I guess
I'll have to live enough for the both of
us from now on.

column3: オレだけでも逃げ延びてやる…
column4: Maybe I can at least still save myself...

column3:
いやー キミ強いんだねえ
ほんの気持ちだけど受け取ってくれ
column4:
Yikes. That was close! Good thing you
showed up. Um, is this enough to return
the favor?

column3:
やるねえ キミ
助かったよ
ほんの気持ちだけど受け取ってくれ
column4: Way to show those monsters who's boss!

column3:
いやー キミ強いんだねえ
ほんとに助かった
お礼をさせてもらうよ
column4:
Wow. I wish I had moves like yours!
Then maybe I wouldn't get in such
trouble with monsters all the time...

column3:
キミのおかげで助かったよ
ほんとに ありがとう
お礼をさせてもらうよ
column4:
I'd be a goner right now without you
stepping in. Thanks! I mean that!

column3:
キミは命の恩人だ！
ぜひ お礼をさせてくれ！
column4:
I owe you my life! I can't thank you
enough! This'll have to do...

column3:
いったいキミって何者なんだい？
ぜひ これを受け取ってくれ！
column4:
How do you MOVE like that?! It was
almost worth getting attacked to see it!
Here, take this! You deserve it!
